thread.section_title: American RV Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American RV Company | www.americanrvcompany.com
thread.title: Rick Volk
thread.title_full: American RV Company reviewed by Rick Volk

author: Rick Volk
title: Rick Volk
text: I had multiple of one large item, so I had to call and get the shipping worked out. They were friendly and quickly determined the right shipping costs. I got the product as promised, when promised, and it was exactly what I was looking for. That is the combination I look for in an online retailer.
